name: Baroque mozzarella
description:
Pocket hallucinations is a Triptych of animated collages for which I composed some small musical pieces for Harpsichord (an ancient keyboard).
The story that runs through these scenes, is from when I was kidnapped by the Schizoid Bunnies.
A few words about the 1st part:

I. Baroque mozzarella


This was more than a little audiovisual mirage.
It worked like a telepathic mirror.
Not only did I see the scene from my individuality,
I could also see it from the point of view
of each character in the scene.
From their eyes, I saw myself looking at them, as I watched them pose.
In the simultaneity of our consciousness, from all of our noses I detected the smell of mozzarella.
Perhaps it was a triangular and greasy portion of Aleph,
maybe it was just another pocket hallucination.
I don't know.
There was no ordinary logic.
I had to turn off the lamp to get out of the loop.
Then the music stopped,
but I was able to catch it,
note by note.
